name: Curse of The Light
description:
Curse of The Light
A game created for the ZenoJam 5 (2022). It's about the theme "Light attracts bugs". As a lost explorer inside a dark dungeon you must find a way out. Unfortunately spiders block your way out and you are only holding a torch. You have to sneak your way through with as less light as possible. Weirdly, the spiders react by the light of your torch. Controls: Player Movement-> WASD Toggle Torch On/Off -> Spacebar To enter the Level from the main title just push "space". Goal: Enter the door on the other side.
